# identifier

**Instance Property**

The value from the FHIR resource’s `id` field.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This identifier is only unique for a particular resource type from a given source. To uniquely identify a FHIR resource, you must compare the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFHIRResource/identifier] and [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFHIRResource/resourceType] properties from the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFHIRResource] object and the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSource/bundleIdentifier] property from the clinical record’s [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKObject/source].

## Accessing FHIR Data

- **fhirVersion**: The FHIR version used by this resource.
- **HKFHIRVersion**: The FHIR version.
- **resourceType**: The value from the FHIR resource’s `resourceType` field.
- **HKFHIRResourceType**: The FHIR resource types supported in HealthKit.
- **sourceURL**: The full URL for the source of the FHIR resource.
- **data**: The JSON representation of the FHIR resource.
